english_example_sentence: The teacher helped everyone by patiently explaining the difficult topic.
russian_example_sentence: Учитель помог всем, терпеливо объясняя сложную тему.
turkish_example_sentence: Öğretmen, zor konuyu sabırla açıklayarak herkese yardım etti.
